headline: IMAGEXPERT IMAGE ANALYSIS SYSTEM
description: Image Analysis System    ImageXpert enables fully automated, objective, quantitative image quality analysis.
categories.lvl2: Inspection Equipment  >  Optical Inspection Equipment > Other Optical Inspection
specstable:
Manufacturer Imagexpert
Model N/A
Description Image Analysis System
Other Information ImageXpert is an automated, fully integrated machine vision-based image quality measurement system.
The core of the system is a powerful image analysis software package designed specifically for image quality evaluation.
Large variety of hardware and software packages available from ImageXpert.(www.imageexpert.com)
System is configured with one camera.
System components
Newport Breadboard (12" x 24")
Newport Model 75 Damped Rod
Sony CCD camera
Optem zoom lense .75X
Lite Mite circular illuminator
Power PC MAC G3 computer
Sony color monitor
Power Requirements 115 V 50/60 Hz 1 Phase
